comment: Obsolete version of ~ clel5 as of 19-May-2023. Alternate definition of class membership: a class ` X ` is an element of another class ` A ` iff there is an element of ` A ` equal to ` X ` . (Contributed by AV, 13-Nov-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
